short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your LinkedIn posts with custom text styles like bold, italic directly from the compose screen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension makes it easy to edit your LinkedIn posts. You can style your text with bold or italic options and quickly add bullet points or numbered lists to improve your posts.
